about_the_game:
Catch Fish! Catch Men!

Overview


Otokonoko Fishing is a unique double fishing action game where you can enjoy two types of fishing in one game! Fish in rivers and seas, and "fish" for men on land by cross-dressing.
Enhance your fishing gear and outfits to aim for fishing grounds where the strongest monster fish dwell!

Game System ①: Fishing


Experience high-speed fishing action as you race through fishing grounds!
Spot your prey and aim with your hookshot!
Push or pull? Outsmart the fish in a battle of wits and reel them in!
Be careful of jump ramps and spiked clubs that are common in fishing grounds!

Game System ②: Crafting


Collect materials by stripping caught fish or picking them up in fishing grounds!
The residents of the port town will craft useful items for you!
Craft powerful fishing gear, snacks for the fishing grounds,
rainbow coffee, self-affirmation, and more to progress advantageously in the game!

Game System ③: Catching Men


Having trouble collecting crafting materials? Time to cross-dress!
We have a full range of outfits like maid costumes, Chinese dresses, cheerleader outfits, and more.
Charm those who propose outrageous rates and haggle, haggle, haggle! 95% off!

Game System ④: Expanding Fishing Grounds


Crafting fishing gear expands your range of action.
Eventually, you’ll be able to fish at night and even head out to sea!
Defeat fish that release poison, fish that emit electric shocks, and fish that release both poison and electric shocks,
and aim for fishing grounds where the strongest monster fish dwell!

Playtime


Approximately 3 hours

Video Distribution Guidelines


You may stream without permission.
You may stream all areas of the game.
Individuals and those affiliated with corporations can stream.
Monetized content is allowed.
We would appreciate it if you mention the game title in your video title.
We would appreciate it if you include a link to the store page in the description (or equivalent).
We are not responsible for any damages resulting from the posting or streaming of content.
These guidelines are subject to change without notice.

highlighted.name: Let's go to the river mouth!

content_descriptors.notes: The cutscene in the game contains depictions that may appear sexual.

short_description: "Otokonoko Fishing” is a dual fishing action game where you can enjoy two types of fishing in one game. Fish in rivers and oceans, and "fish for men" on land while dressed as a woman. Enhance your fishing gear and outfits, and aim for the fishing grounds where the strongest monster fish live!
supported_languages: Japanese, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Korean
